---
title: PCAP Uploading and Comparing Sequence Diagram
author: Project Sentinel
---

sequenceDiagram
    participant User as Pro User (Dashboard)
    participant Backend as Sentinel Backend API

    User-->>Backend: Upload PCAP file
    Backend-->>Backend: Match packets to alerts
    Backend-->>User: Show comparison results in dashboard
    User-->>User: View PCAP analysis and alert matches
repo_description: A web based IDS with agentic multi-IDS forwarder
